sqlMap.statement:
SELECT BjobMsgScheID AS "BJOBMSGSCHEID", BjobMsgDstcd AS "BJOBMSGDSTCD", OsidInstiDstcd AS "OSIDINSTIDSTCD", SndrcvStartHMS AS "SNDRCVSTARTHMS", SndrcvEndHMS AS "SndrcvEndHMS", MsgSndrID AS "MSGSNDRID" , ScheFrstRegiHMS AS "SCHEFRSTREGIHMS" , ThisMsgUseYn AS "THISMSGUSEYN" , ThisMsgScheDesc AS "THISMSGSCHEDESC" , BjobBzwkDstcd AS "BJOBBZWKDSTCD", BjobTranDstcdName AS "BJOBTRANDSTCDNAME", BjobBzwkName AS "BJOBBZWKNAME", OsidInstiName AS "OSIDINSTINAME" , BjobMsgDsticName AS "BJOBMSGDSTICNAME" , BjobPtrnDstcd AS "BJOBPTRNDSTCD" , GroupCoCd AS "GROUPCOCD" , ROWNO AS "ROW_NUMBER" FROM ( SELECT A.BjobMsgScheID , A.BjobMsgDstcd , A.OsidInstiDstcd , A.SndrcvStartHMS , A.SndrcvEndHMS , A.MsgSndrID , A.ScheFrstRegiHMS , A.ThisMsgUseYn , A.ThisMsgScheDesc , B.BjobBzwkDstcd , B.BjobTranDstcdName , C.BjobBzwkName , D.OsidInstiName , B.BjobMsgDsticName , A.BjobPtrnDstcd , B.GroupCoCd , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(order by BjobBzwkName, OsidInstiName,BjobTranDstcdName) ROWNO FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIBS01 A, $schemaId$.TSEAIBJ01 B, $schemaId$.TSEAIBJ02 C, $schemaId$.TSEAIBJ06 D WHERE A.BjobMsgDstcd = B.BjobMsgDstcd AND B.BjobBzwkDstcd = C.BjobBzwkDstcd AND B.BjobBzwkDstcd = D.BjobBzwkDstcd AND A.OsidInstiDstcd = D.OsidInstiDstcd
C.BjobBzwkName LIKE '%' || #searchBjobBzwkName# || '%'
D.OsidInstiName LIKE '%' || #searchOsidInstiName# || '%'
B.BjobTranDstcdName LIKE '%' || #searchBjobTranDstcdName# || '%'
B.BjobMsgDsticName LIKE '%' || #searchBjobMsgDsticName# || '%'
A.BjobPtrnDstcd = #searchBjobPtrnDstcd#
B.GroupCoCd = #searchGroupCoCd#
A.SndrcvStartHMS BETWEEN #searchStartHMS# AND #searchEndHMS#
) TMP WHERE ROWNO BETWEEN #startNum# AND #endNum#

SELECT COUNT(*) AS "TOTALCOUNT" FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.BjobMsgScheID , A.BjobMsgDstcd , A.OsidInstiDstcd , A.SndrcvStartHMS , A.SndrcvEndHMS , A.MsgSndrID , A.ScheFrstRegiHMS , A.ThisMsgUseYn , A.ThisMsgScheDesc , B.BjobBzwkDstcd , B.BjobTranDstcdName , C.BjobBzwkName , D.OsidInstiName , B.BjobMsgDsticName , A.BjobPtrnDstcd FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIBS01 A, $schemaId$.TSEAIBJ01 B, $schemaId$.TSEAIBJ02 C, $schemaId$.TSEAIBJ06 D WHERE A.BjobMsgDstcd = B.BjobMsgDstcd AND B.BjobBzwkDstcd = C.BjobBzwkDstcd AND B.BjobBzwkDstcd = D.BjobBzwkDstcd AND A.OsidInstiDstcd = D.OsidInstiDstcd
C.BjobBzwkName LIKE '%' || #searchBjobBzwkName# || '%'
D.OsidInstiName LIKE '%' || #searchOsidInstiName# || '%'
B.BjobTranDstcdName LIKE '%' || #searchBjobTranDstcdName# || '%'
B.BjobMsgDsticName LIKE '%' || #searchBjobMsgDsticName# || '%'
A.BjobPtrnDstcd = #searchBjobPtrnDstcd#
B.GroupCoCd = #searchGroupCoCd#
A.SndrcvStartHMS BETWEEN #searchStartHMS# AND #searchEndHMS#
) TMP ) T

SELECT BS01.BjobMsgScheID AS "BJOBMSGSCHEID", BJ01.BjobBzwkDstcd AS "BJOBBZWKDSTCD" , BS01.BjobMsgDstcd AS "BJOBMSGDSTCD", BS01.OsidInstiDstcd AS "OSIDINSTIDSTCD", BS01.BjobPtrnDstcd AS "BJOBPTRNDSTCD", SUBSTR(BS01.SndrcvStartHMS,0,2)||':'||SUBSTR(BS01.SndrcvStartHMS,3,2) AS "SNDRCVSTARTHMS1", SUBSTR(BS01.SndrcvEndHMS,0,2)||':'||SUBSTR(BS01.SndrcvEndHMS,3,2) AS "SNDRCVENDHMS1", RTRIM(BS01.SndrcvStartHMS) AS "SNDRCVSTARTHMS", RTRIM(BS01.SndrcvEndHMS) AS "SNDRCVENDHMS", BS01.StartDlayNoday AS "STARTDLAYNODAY", BS01.EndDlayNoday AS "ENDDLAYNODAY" , BS01.RqstRecvReTralCnt AS "RQSTRECVRETRALCNT" , BS01.RqstRecvReTralUseYn AS "RQSTRECVRETRALUSEYN" , BS01.RqstRecvReTralIntvalTtm AS "RQSTRECVRETRALINTVALTTM" , BS01.HoldyPrcssDstcd AS "HOLDYPRCSSDSTCD" , BS01.RpttYn AS "RPTTYN" , BS01.ThisMsgUseYn AS "THISMSGUSEYN" , BS01.ScheFrstRegiHMS AS "SCHEFRSTREGIHMS" , BS01.MsgSndrID AS "MSGSNDRID" FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIBS01 BS01 , $schemaId$.TSEAIBJ01 BJ01 WHERE BS01.BjobMsgDstcd = BJ01.BjobMsgDstcd AND RTRIM(BS01.BjobMsgScheID) = RTRIM(#bJobMsgScheId#)
SELECT BjobMsgDstcd AS "CODE", '[' || BjobTranDstcdName || '] ' || BjobMsgDsticName AS "NAME" FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIBJ01 WHERE LTRIM(RTRIM(BjobBzwkDstcd)) = #bjobBzwkDstcd# ORDER BY BjobTranDstcdName
SELECT OsidInstiDstcd AS "CODE", '[' || OsidInstiDstcd || '] ' || OsidInstiName AS "NAME" FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIBJ06 WHERE LTRIM(RTRIM(BjobBzwkDstcd)) = #bjobBzwkDstcd# ORDER BY OsidInstiDstcd

SELECT 'RS' AS "CODE", '송신' AS "NAME" FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIBJ01 WHERE EAIFileSendUseYn = '1' AND BjobMsgDstcd = #bjobMsgDstcd# UNION SELECT 'RR' AS "CODE", '수신' AS "NAME" FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIBJ01 WHERE EAIFileRecvUseYn = '1' AND BjobMsgDstcd = #bjobMsgDstcd# ORDER BY "NAME"

SELECT BjobBzwkDstcd|| #bjobPtrnDstcd# ||BjobTranDstcdName|| ( SELECT CASE LENGTH(TO_CHAR(TO_NUMBER(COALESCE(MAX(SUBSTR(RTRIM(BjobMsgScheID), LENGTH(RTRIM(BjobMsgScheID))-2, 3)), '0')) + 1)) WHEN 1 THEN '00' || TO_CHAR(TO_NUMBER(COALESCE(MAX(SUBSTR(RTRIM(BjobMsgScheID), LENGTH(RTRIM(BjobMsgScheID))-2, 3)), '0')) + 1) WHEN 2 THEN '0' || TO_CHAR(TO_NUMBER(COALESCE(MAX(SUBSTR(RTRIM(BjobMsgScheID), LENGTH(RTRIM(BjobMsgScheID))-2, 3)), '0')) + 1) WHEN 3 THEN TO_CHAR(TO_NUMBER(COALESCE(MAX(SUBSTR(RTRIM(BjobMsgScheID), LENGTH(RTRIM(BjobMsgScheID))-2, 3)), '0')) + 1) END FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIBS01 WHERE BjobMsgDstcd = #bjobMsgDstcd# ) LEFTCODE FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIBJ01 WHERE BjobMsgDstcd = #bjobMsgDstcd#
